name: Kumulus
short_description:
Kumulus is a software stack that provides a complete KVM based cloud infrastructure.

Kumulus components are:

* the Kernel Virtual Machine (KVM)
* a CLI management tool for all components
* a GUI (X11) management tool for all components
* a SAN storage solution
* a data backup solution
* a VNC based webtop system providing web access to all management components

Kumulus is designed to be very scalable and very mainstream hardware friendly. Possible Kumulus cloud sizes range from a single PC - e.g. a software development PC where you want to test your projects using different virtual operating system - to large HPC environments.
summary: Kumulus provides a complete KVM based cloud infrastructure.
